thread.title: BRIEF-Procter & Gamble Resolves Crest Whitestrips Patent Infringement Dispute With Ranir

title: BRIEF-Procter & Gamble Resolves Crest Whitestrips Patent Infringement Dispute With Ranir

organizations.name: brief-procter & gamble resolves crest whitestrips patent infringement dispute with ranir

text: 07 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Procter & Gamble Resolves Crest Whitestrips Patent Infringement Dispute With Ranir Reuters Staff March 13 (Reuters) - Procter & Gamble Co: * PROCTER & GAMBLE RESOLVES CREST® WHITESTRIPS PATENT INFRINGEMENT DISPUTE WITH RANIR * P&G - ‍RESOLVED ITS PATENT INFRINGEMENT DISPUTE WITH RANIR, LLC REGARDING RANIR’S TOOTH WHITENING STRIP PRODUCTS IN UNITED STATES AND CANADA​ * P&G - AS PART OF SETTLEMENT, RANIR LLC ACQUIRED RIGHTS TO P&G PATENTS UNDER COMMERCIAL TERMS THAT ARE CONFIDENTIAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
